name: Angkara: The Horde
description:
Enter the world of Angkara: The Horde, a horde-mode wave survival game set in a mystical mythological realm inspired by Southeast Asian culture and mythology. Survive as long as possible on the Arena - or earn a heroic death in battle!

Enter the world of Angkara: The Horde, a horde-mode wave survival game set in a mystical mythological realm inspired by Southeast Asian culture and mythology. Survive as long as possible on the Arena or complete the mission as fast as possible and emerge victorious against other player - or earn a heroic death in battle!

As you progress through the game, you'll have access to a variety of tools of destruction that you can upgrade to your liking. Choose from a selection of random perks each time you level up, giving you a unique advantage in battle. Utilize the power of relics such as Sajen and Jimat to give you an edge over your enemies.

But the real challenge comes from competing against other players from around the world. Compete for the highest score and fastest completion time and see if you have what it takes to emerge as the ultimate survivor in Angkara: The Horde.

With familiar retro graphics reminiscent of games like Hexen, Angkara: The Horde will engage your nostalgia while still providing a fresh and immersive gameplay experience. Grab your weapons and prepare to face the horde – the fate of the realm depends on you!
